hero.text1: ATTENTION: BURNT OUT COACHES, CONSULTANTS, ENTREPRENEURS & MARKETERS!
hero.text2: Discover The MOST Effective Method for Using Sales Funnels That the Top 7 Figure Online Businesses are using TODAY, Without Having to Learn Complicated Tech or Code, Ultimately Scaling Up Your Business and Reclaiming Your Time!
hero.text3: Even If You've Tried Every Other Course, Mastermind, Or Outdated Program. This Indisputable New Formula will be all you need To Create & Launch Your Own Wildly Profitably Online Business With High Paying Clients That Keep Coming Back…..
hero.button: Yes, claim my ticket to The Idea Pod Live

about.heading: THE PATH TO YOUR MOST PROFITABLE YEAR EVER MUST START NOW…
about.text1: You're willing and eager to learn and implement, but you just don't know what to do next or where to start
about.text2: You've had a tough start to date, growth in your business hasn’t been as quick as you anticipated but despite that, you believe in your business and know it has the potential to scale.
about.text3: You're ready for a change in your digital marketing systems
about.text4: You've seen and heard of other people making good money through funnels you want someone to show you how to make money too.

events.heading: The Idea Pod Events
events.noEvent: No Events has been Registered Yet!

features.text1: WHO IS THE IDEA POD PROGRAM FOR??
features.text2_1: YOU are probably fully aware that scaling your business online isn’t an easy task.
features.text2_2: There seem to be quite a few things you’re missing, since you’ve yet to repeatedly make sales through your existing funnels. There are A LOT of questions you want answers.
features.text2_3: That’s why we're giving you a chance to join the Idea Pod program. This event will give you a chance to connect with other innovators, and trail-blazing business owners like you, learn from the best, most relatable educators, and FINALLY develop the most effective digital marketing methods to scale your business for an affordable price!
features.text2_4: When you enroll in the program, you’ll be joined by a moderately small group of people from all walks of life: entrepreneurs, executives, creatives, coaches, leaders, dreamers, visionaries, students, seekers, athletes… the list goes on.
features.text2_5: But there is ONE characteristic that defines every single person who takes the action to sign up: AMBITION.
features.text2_6: If you have a huge vision paired with a daily hunger to scale your business and impact the lives of each one of your customers... and maximize your profitability... YOU BELONG HERE IN THIS PROGRAM
features.feature1: Will you continue to let procrastination take over?
features.feature2: Allow a lack of confidence riddle you with anxiety for the rest of your life?
features.feature3: Continue to follow advice that hasn't worked?
features.feature4: Continue to blame others for your lack of success?
features.text3: If you've had ENOUGH and are ready to BREAK FREE from Group Think and Social Conditioning that keeps you in the Self Actualization Rat Race…
features.text4: Grab Your FREE Ticket to the Higher Purpose Tour Before Our Limited Seating Books Out!
features.text5: Learn how to generate £5,000 - £10,000 per client online
features.text6: Every day the news talks about how high inflation is, and you can see things like food and gas getting more expensive.
features.text7: So, you need to find a way to take control of your money. X years ago, I started out from my bedroom in my Mum’s house. I found a way to grow my company, Brussel Lake Paragon with the information I learned from online training programs.
features.text8: People didn’t really believe that it was possible, and they insisted I must have had some in-person guidance. I said that online learning was the next big thing.
features.text9: And, I created a test group, showed them how I learned, how I implemented, and how they could grow their own business... Step by step.
features.text10: Many who joined me, now have an insanely profitable business that they started from scratch! With no prior business knowledge or formal degree in business education offline.
features.text11: Right now, there's an even bigger opportunity for you to achieve the same level of success and MORE! In The idea Pod, I'll teach you exactly how to build and scale your business using digital marketing and sales funnels, starting from scratch.
features.text12: There's a catch though. The window for this opportunity is closing FAST! As you read this, more and more people are learning the formula and achieving their success... fortunately for you, you’re reading this right now and the opportunity is right in front of you.
features.text13: Claim your spot in the program and learn all my secrets and strategies I would use to build a profitable business that makes a huge impact. Stop trying to figure this out on your own. Just copy me.
features.higherPurposeText: This is NOT going to be a 'ONE-SIZE-FITS-ALL' Approach like every other GuRu out there promising you success...
features.featuresImageHeadline: Instead, we're going to leverage on my #1 secret formula (that took me years to figure out)
features.featuresImageText1: So we are 100% clear on what ‘scaling’ and ‘profitable’ means for your business
features.featuresImageText2: And what precisely is standing in your way from getting SALES
features.featuresImageText3: Learn how to build and implement profitable sales funnels in your business and how to use updated digital marketing strategies to gain a steady flow of traffic to your funnel. We identify the right steps and a real game plan for how to get it done.
features.featuresImageText4: This is the big one where most people who try to scale their business alone really fall short. If no one’s watching you, it’s easy to just quit when things get tough – but not on my watch.
features.featuresImageText5: I'll challenge you to push past your limits, which ultimately leads to your success

COME EXPERIENCE THE LIFE-DEFINING,
PERSONAL TRANSFORMATION

opportunity.text6:
For over 20 years, we've changed the lives of hundreds of thousands of people worldwide.
We're considered to be the industry's best for a reason.
opportunity.text7:
The transformations and results we produce from our events and programs are second to none,
and have turned the lives of millions of people around; from all walks of life.
opportunity.text8:
We've helped people go from shy, timid, self doubting and complete followers… into confident,
grounded leaders who today enjoy the life deep down they set out to live.

testnomials.testnomialsText1: This program actually blew my expectations. I mean the the way Owen covered so many topics. I wasn't expecting so much. Let alone so many of those things help me in so many ways.
testnomials.testnomialsText2: You're also around so many positive people, you're talking to people make connections, that's the biggest thing and one of my biggest things I realize by being here.
testnomials.card1Heading: Our Break Free to Higher Purpose Method
testnomials.card1Text:
From showing you the true interpretation of what Society teaches you...

... to bringing awareness to past experiences that may be leading your life unbeknownst to you

... to empowering you with the tools and knowledge to break free and purpose your higher purpose with relentless motivation.
testnomials.card2Text:
Connect and from lifelong relationship with other like-minded people who are on a similar path of growth and self-actualization.

Find inspiration, healthy mutual accountability and share your wins and lessons to accelerate your growth areas where you share common interests.
testnomials.card3Heading: Our Break Free to Higher Purpose Method
testnomials.card3Text:
We'll shed light on the misleading concepts about success, health, wealth, relationships and higher purpose you've been taught...

... and teach you how to break free from group think and self or society imposed limiting beliefs so you walk out fully armed to achieve exactly what you want in life!
